title: YT-1350 Transport

Damage: 7D ''Capsule''': The YT-1350 is a cut down version of the popular YT-1300, basically a halved model of that design. However the lighter hull allows a faster drive result, that grants them to be a an efficient and deadly combat vessel, not as week as a standard transporter.
